Detailed Description

VibratorDevice is a simple class for controlling the vibrator. It is a singleton - use GetInstance(). Use StartVibrator() to start a vibrator and StopVibrator() to stop it

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum VibratorDevice::VibratorMode
 

Operating mode of vibrator. Tells which mode the vibrator should be working in.

Enumerator:
Vibrator_Sync_Control  not yet supported
Vibrator_Async_1  440ms on, 440ms off
Vibrator_Async_2  500ms on, 500ms off
Vibrator_Async_3  660ms on, 660ms off
Vibrator_Async_4  1second on, 1second off
Vibrator_Async_5  2seconds on, 2seconds off
Vibrator_Async_6  constantly on
